LanguageData.OG_NutrientSolution.label: nutrient solution
LanguageData.OG_NutrientSolution.description: A mixture of water, amino acids, fats & vitamins for growing biological matter.
LanguageData.OG_ProteinMash.label: protein mash
LanguageData.OG_ProteinMash.description: Protein from different sources mashed together into a disgusting mash. Perfect for growing organs and living beings from.
